description:
The Credit Card Validator plugin enables quick and secure validation of credit card numbers, identifying card types directly on the client side. This validation process does not require external APIs, ensuring that card information remains safe and secure within your application. Easily integrate this tool to enhance your app's payment forms, providing instant feedback on card number validity and type.

[b]Usage Features:[/b] 

- Validates credit card numbers locally without external APIs.
- Detects the card type (Visa, MasterCard, etc.) based on the card number.
- Instant validation feedback to improve user experience.
- Secure, client-side validation keeps card data within your app.

[size=5][b]FAQ[/b][/size]

- [b]How does this plugin validate credit card numbers?[/b]  
The plugin uses a standard algorithm to verify the structure of credit card numbers and identify if they match known patterns for valid card types.

- [b]Is any external API used for card validation?[/b]  
No, the validation is performed locally within your app, ensuring that card details are not sent to any external servers.

- [b]Can this plugin identify the type of credit card?[/b]  
Yes, the plugin can identify the card type based on the number provided (e.g., Visa, MasterCard).

- [b]Will this plugin work with all credit card types?[/b]  
The plugin supports major card types; however, certain niche or less common card types may not be recognized.

- [b]How can I set up the validator in my app?[/b]  
Simply add the plugin to your form, bind it to an input field for the card number, and the plugin will handle validation automatically as users type.
